attributes.action: Demand a Peoples' parliament to support the Church House Declaration
attributes.additional_details:
Part of the declaration signed today...

"Shutting down Parliament would be an undemocratic outrage at such a crucial moment for our country, and a historic constitutional crisis.

"Any attempt to prevent Parliament sitting, to force through a no deal Brexit, will be met by strong and widespread democratic resistance.

"We pledge to work together across parties and across our nations to do whatever is necessary to ensure that the people's voice is able to be heard."
attributes.background: This afternoon, 160 MPs signed an anti-no deal Brexit pledge called the 'Church House Declaration'. Since 2016, Brexit has been a thorn in the UK's side and now become clear that a no-deal Brexit would be a disaster for the UK. We request a Peoples' parliament to support the Declaration.

rejection.details:
